priority_definitions.critical: Must be working for app to function - blocking issues
priority_definitions.high: Important for good user experience - should be completed soon
priority_definitions.medium: Nice to have features that improve usability

testing_approach.manual_testing: Test features through the app UI on physical devices (iOS and Android)
testing_approach.e2e_testing: Automated end-to-end tests using Detox or Maestro
testing_approach.api_testing: Test backend API endpoints using in-app test suite
testing_approach.regression_testing: Re-test existing features after making changes
testing_approach.integration_testing: Test feature interactions and data flow

next_steps: Review this feature list with the team
Prioritize features based on business goals
Begin implementing and testing features incrementally
Update 'passes' status as features are completed and verified
Focus on critical bugs first (warmth tracking, note creation, message sending)
Implement high-priority features second (AI message generation, contact import)
Optimize performance and add enhancements last

autonomous_coding_instructions.approach: Work through features incrementally, testing each one thoroughly before moving to the next
workflow: 1. Select next feature from feature list (prioritize by: critical > high > medium > low)
2. Read relevant code files to understand current implementation
3. Implement the feature or fix the bug
4. Test the feature against all test criteria
5. Update feature 'passes' status to true if all criteria met
quality_standards: All code must follow existing patterns in the codebase
User-facing messages must be clear and friendly
Changes must not break existing features
All test criteria must pass before marking feature complete
testing_requirements: Test on both iOS and Android when platform-specific
Verify edge cases and error scenarios
